mainBoard.name: The Mechanist, Aerial Artisan

rulings.text: Effects that modify a creature's power and/or toughness, such as the ones created by Titanic Growth or a +/1+1 counter, will apply to the creature no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for any counters that change its power and/or toughness and effects that switch power and toughness.

If the artifact token was already a creature, its base power and toughness will become 3/1. This overwrites any previous effects that set the creature's base power and toughness to specific values. Any power- or toughness-setting effects that start to apply after The Mechanist, Aerial Artisan's ability resolves will overwrite this effect.
The Mechanist, Aerial Artisan's activated ability doesn't remove any abilities the target artifact token has. The artifact token also retains any types, subtypes, or supertypes it has.

The resulting artifact creature will be able to attack on your turn if it's been under your control continuously since the turn began. That is, it doesn't matter how long it's been a creature, just how long it's been on the battlefield.

Dégagez un terrain ciblé.

foreignData.name: Sokkas Haiku
foreignData.text:
Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.
Ziehe eine Karte, dann millst du drei Karten.
Enttappe ein Land deiner Wahl.

foreignData.name: Haiku di Sokka
foreignData.text:
Neutralizza una magia bersaglio.
Pesca una carta, poi macina tre carte.
STAPpa una terra bersaglio.

foreignData.name: サカの俳句
foreignData.text:
呪文１つを対象とする。それを打ち消す。
カード１枚を引く。その後、カード３枚を切削する。
土地１つを対象とする。それをアンタップする。

foreignData.name: Haiku de Sokka
foreignData.text:
Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo.
Roba una carta y luego muele tres cartas.
Endereza la tierra objetivo.

mainBoard.name: Sokka's Haiku

rulings.text: A haiku has five syllables in the first and third lines and seven in the second line.

mainBoard.text:
Counter target spell.
Draw a card, then mill three cards.
Untap target land.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Ember Island gives everyone a clean slate. Ember Island reveals the true you."
—Lo and Li

foreignData.flavorText:
« L'île de Braise fait table rase du passé. L'île de Braise révèle votre véritable nature. »
-Lo et Li
foreignData.name: Île prospère
foreignData.text:
Ce terrain arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le bleu.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Die Ascheninsel ermöglicht jedem einen Neubeginn. Die Ascheninsel enthüllt dein wahres Ich."
- Lo und Li
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Insel
foreignData.text:
Dieses Land kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie es ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Blau.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText:
"L'Isola di Ember offre l'opportunità di ripartire da zero. L'Isola di Ember rivela la tua vera natura."
-Lo e Li
foreignData.name: Isola Florida
foreignData.text:
Questa terra entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal blu.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText:
「エンバー島ではだれもがまっさらな状態になれる。本当の自分をさらけ出せるのです。」
――ローとリー
foreignData.name: 興隆する島嶼
foreignData.text:
この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、青でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{U}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Isla Ascua ofrece a todo el mundo un comienzo nuevo. Isla Ascua revela tu verdadero ser".
-Lo y Li
foreignData.name: Islote floreciente
foreignData.text:
Esta tierra entra girada. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea azul.
{T}: Agrega {U} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
